80 
81  union
82  {
83  struct
84  {
85  T m[4][4];
86  };
87  struct
88  {
89  T ml[16];
90  };
91  struct
92  {
93  T
94  m11, m12, m13, m14,
95  m21, m22, m23, m24,
96  m31, m32, m33, m34,
97  m41, m42, m43, m44;
98  };
99  };
100 
101  };
102 
103  template <class T>
104  MatrixT<T>::MatrixT()
105  {
106  }
107 
108  template <class T>
109  MatrixT<T>::MatrixT(const T* p)
110  {
111  for (int i = 0; i < 16; ++i)
112  ml[i] = p[i];
113  }
114 
115  template <class T>
116  MatrixT<T>::MatrixT(T _11, T _12, T _13, T _14,
117  T _21, T _22, T _23, T _24,
118  T _31, T _32, T _33, T _34,
119  T _41, T _42, T _43, T _44):
120  m11(_11), m12(_12), m13(_13), m14(_14),
121  m21(_21), m22(_22), m23(_23), m24(_24),
122  m31(_31), m32(_32), m33(_33), m34(_34),
123  m41(_41), m42(_42), m43(_43), m44(_44)
124  {
125  }

127 
128  template <class T>
129  void MatrixT<T>::identity()
130  {
131  vector4* rows = (vector4*)ml;
132  rows[0] = VectorT4<T>(1, 0, 0, 0);
133  rows[1] = VectorT4<T>(0, 1, 0, 0);
134  rows[2] = VectorT4<T>(0, 0, 1, 0);
135  rows[3] = VectorT4<T>(0, 0, 0, 1);
136  }
137 
138  template <class T>
139  void MatrixT<T>::inverse()
140  {
141  inverse(this, *this);
142  }
143 
144 
145 
146 
147  template <class T>
148  MatrixT<T> MatrixT<T>::inversed() const
149  {
150  matrix m;
151  inverse(m, *this);
152  return m;
153  }
154 
155  template <class T>
156  MatrixT<T> MatrixT<T>::ident()
157  {
158  MatrixT m;
159  m.identity();
160  return m;
161  }

165  void MatrixT<T>::transpose()
166  {
167  transpose(*this, *this);
168  }

171  template <class T>
172  MatrixT<T> MatrixT<T>::transposed() const
173  {
174  matrix m;
175  transpose(m, *this);
176  return m;
177  }

179  template <class T>
180  void MatrixT<T>::translate(const vector3& t)
181  {
182  matrix tm;
183  matrix::translation(tm, t);
184  *this = *this * tm;
185  }
186 
187  template <class T>
188  void MatrixT<T>::scale(const vector3& s)
189  {
190  matrix sm;
191  matrix::scaling(sm, s);
192  *this = *this * sm;
193  }
194 
195  template <class T>
196  void MatrixT<T>::buildSRT(const vector3& s, T angle, const vector3& t)
197  {
198  matrix sm, rm, tm;
199  matrix::scaling(&sm, s);
200  matrix::rotationY(&rm, angle);
201  matrix::translation(&tm, t);
202 
203  *this = sm * rm * tm;
204  }

209  {
210  vector3 out;
211  transformVec3(out, v, *this);
212  return out;
213  }

216  VectorT4<T> MatrixT<T>::transformVec4(const vector4& v)const

218  vector4 out;

220  return out;

223  template <class T>
224  VectorT3<T> MatrixT<T>::getTranslation()const
225  {
226  vector4* rows = (vector4*)ml;
227  return vector3(rows[3].x, rows[3].y, rows[3].z);
228  }
229 
230 #define rcDot4(r, c) (mrows[r].x * nrows[0][c] + mrows[r].y * nrows[1][c] + mrows[r].z * nrows[2][c] + mrows[r].w * nrows[3][c])
231 
232  template <class T>
233  MatrixT<T> MatrixT<T>::operator *(const MatrixT<T>& n) const
234  {
235  const vector4* mrows = (vector4*)ml;
236  const vector4* nrows = (vector4*)n.ml;
237  matrix mat
238  (
239  rcDot4(0, 0), rcDot4(0, 1), rcDot4(0, 2), rcDot4(0, 3),
240  rcDot4(1, 0), rcDot4(1, 1), rcDot4(1, 2), rcDot4(1, 3),
241  rcDot4(2, 0), rcDot4(2, 1), rcDot4(2, 2), rcDot4(2, 3),
242  rcDot4(3, 0), rcDot4(3, 1), rcDot4(3, 2), rcDot4(3, 3)
243  );
244  return mat;
245  }
246 
247  template <class T>
248  VectorT4<T>& MatrixT<T>::operator [](int row)
249  {
250  vector4* rows = (vector4*)ml;
251  return rows[row];
252  }

256  MatrixT<T>::operator T* () const
257  {

262  MatrixT<T>::operator const T* () const
263  {
264  return ml;

266 
267  template <class T>
268  inline MatrixT<T>& MatrixT<T>::lookAtLH(MatrixT& out,
269  const vector3& Eye,
270  const vector3& At,
271  const vector3& Up)
272  {
273  vector3 x, y, z, temp;
274  vector3::normalize(z, At - Eye);
275  vector3::normalize(x, vector3::cross(temp, Up, z));
276  vector3::normalize(y, vector3::cross(temp, z, x));
277 
278  out = matrix(
279  x.x, y.x, z.x, 0,
280  x.y, y.y, z.y, 0,
281  x.z, y.z, z.z, 0,
282  -vector3::dot(x, Eye), -vector3::dot(y, Eye), -vector3::dot(z, Eye), 1);
283 
284  return out;
285  }
286 
287  template <class T>
288  inline MatrixT<T>& MatrixT<T>::lookAtRH(MatrixT& out,
289  const vector3& Eye,
290  const vector3& At,
291  const vector3& Up)
292  {
293  vector3 x, y, z, temp;
294  vector3::normalize(z, Eye - At);
295  vector3::normalize(x, vector3::cross(temp, Up, z));
296  vector3::normalize(y, vector3::cross(temp, z, x));
297 
298  *out = matrix(
299  x.x, y.x, z.x, 0,
300  x.y, y.y, z.y, 0,
301  x.z, y.z, z.z, 0,
302  -vector3::dot(x, Eye), -vector3::dot(y, Eye), -vector3::dot(z, Eye), 1);
303 
304  return out;
305  }
306 
307  template <class T>
308  inline MatrixT<T>& MatrixT<T>::rotationX(MatrixT& out, T angle)
309  {
310  T s = scalar::sin(angle);
311  T c = scalar::cos(angle);
312 
313  out = MatrixT(
314  1, 0, 0, 0,
315  0, c, s, 0,
316  0, -s, c, 0,
317  0, 0, 0, 1);
318  return out;
319  }
320 
321  template <class T>
322  inline MatrixT<T>& MatrixT<T>::rotationY(MatrixT& out, T angle)
323  {
324  T s = scalar::sin(angle);
325  T c = scalar::cos(angle);
326  out = MatrixT(
327  c, 0, -s, 0,
328  0, 1, 0, 0,
329  s, 0, c, 0,
330  0, 0, 0, 1);
331  return out;
332  }
333 
334  template <class T>
335  inline MatrixT<T>& MatrixT<T>::rotationZ(MatrixT& out, T angle)
336  {
337  T s = scalar::sin(angle);
338  T c = scalar::cos(angle);
339  out = MatrixT(
340  c, s, 0, 0,
341  -s, c, 0, 0,
342  0, 0, 1, 0,
343  0, 0, 0, 1);
344  return out;
345  }
346 
347 
348 
349  template <class T>
350  inline MatrixT<T>& MatrixT<T>::translation(MatrixT& out, const vector3& v)
351  {
352  out = MatrixT(
353  1, 0, 0, 0,
354  0, 1, 0, 0,
355  0, 0, 1, 0,
356  v.x, v.y, v.z, 1);
357  return out;
358  }
359 
360  template <class T>
361  inline MatrixT<T>& MatrixT<T>::scaling(MatrixT& out, const vector3& v)
362  {
363  out = MatrixT(
364  v.x, 0, 0, 0,
365  0, v.y, 0, 0,
366  0, 0, v.z, 0,
367  0, 0, 0, 1);
368 
369  return out;
370  }
371 
372  template <class T>
373  inline MatrixT<T>& MatrixT<T>::perspectiveFovLH(MatrixT& out, T fovy, T aspect, T zNear, T zFar)
374  {
375  float y = T(1) / scalar::tan(T(0.5) * fovy);
376  float x = y / aspect;
377 
378  out = matrix(
379  x, 0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f,
380  0.0f, y, 0.0f, 0.0f,
381  0.0f, 0.0f, zFar / (zFar - zNear), 1.0f,
382  0.0f, 0.0f, -zFar * zNear / (zFar - zNear), 0.0f);
383  return out;
384  }
385 
386  template <class T>
387  inline MatrixT<T>& MatrixT<T>::perspectiveFovRH(MatrixT& out, T fovy, T aspect, T zNear, T zFar)
388  {
389  float y = T(1) / scalar::tan(T(0.5) * fovy);
390  float x = y / aspect;
391 
392  out = matrix(
393  x, 0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f,
394  0.0f, y, 0.0f, 0.0f,
395  0.0f, 0.0f, zFar / (zFar - zNear), -1.0f,
396  0.0f, 0.0f, zFar * zNear / (zFar - zNear), 0.0f);
397  return out;
398  }
399 
400  template <class T>
401  inline MatrixT<T>& MatrixT<T>::perspectiveOffCenterLH(MatrixT& out, T left, T right, T bottom, T top, T znearPlane, T zfarPlane)
402  {
403  out = matrix(
404  2 * znearPlane / (right - left), 0, 0, 0,
405  0, 2 * znearPlane / (top - bottom), 0, 0,
406  (left + right) / (left - right), (top + bottom) / (bottom - top), zfarPlane / (zfarPlane - znearPlane), 1,
407  0, 0, znearPlane * zfarPlane / (znearPlane - zfarPlane), 0);
408  return out;
409  }
410 
411  template <class T>
412  inline MatrixT<T>& MatrixT<T>::perspectiveOffCenterRH(MatrixT& out, T left, T right, T bottom, T top, T znearPlane, T zfarPlane)
413  {
414  out = matrix(
415  2 * znearPlane / (right - left), 0, 0, 0,
416  0, 2 * znearPlane / (top - bottom), 0, 0,
417  (left + right) / (right - left), (top + bottom) / (top - bottom), zfarPlane / (znearPlane - zfarPlane), -1,
418  0, 0, znearPlane * zfarPlane / (znearPlane - zfarPlane), 0);
419  return out;
420  }
421 
422  template <class T>
423  inline MatrixT<T>& MatrixT<T>::orthoLH(MatrixT& out, T w, T h, T zNear, T zFar)
424  {
425  out = matrix(
426  T(2) / w, 0, 0, 0,
427  0, T(2) / h, 0, 0,
428  0, 0, T(1) / (zFar - zNear), 0,
429  0, 0, zNear / (zNear - zFar), 1);
430  return out;
431  }
432 
433  template <class T>
434  inline MatrixT<T>& MatrixT<T>::inverse(MatrixT& out, const MatrixT& mat)
435  {
436  T a9 = mat.m31 * mat.m42 - mat.m32 * mat.m41;
437  T aa = mat.m31 * mat.m43 - mat.m33 * mat.m41;
438  T a8 = mat.m31 * mat.m44 - mat.m34 * mat.m41;
439 
440  T a2 = mat.m32 * mat.m43 - mat.m33 * mat.m42;
441  T a5 = mat.m32 * mat.m44 - mat.m34 * mat.m42;
442  T a3 = mat.m33 * mat.m44 - mat.m34 * mat.m43;
443 
444  T t1 = mat.m22 * a3 - mat.m23 * a5 + mat.m24 * a2;
445  T t2 = mat.m21 * a3 - mat.m23 * a8 + mat.m24 * aa;
446  T t3 = mat.m21 * a5 - mat.m22 * a8 + mat.m24 * a9;
447  T t4 = mat.m21 * a2 - mat.m22 * aa + mat.m23 * a9;
448 
449  T det = mat.m11 * t1 - mat.m12 * t2 + mat.m13 * t3 - mat.m14 * t4;
450 
451  if (scalar::abs(det) < T(0.0001))
452  {
453  out.identity();
454  return out;
455  }
456 
457  det = T(1) / (det);
458 
459  T a0 = mat.m21 * mat.m32 - mat.m22 * mat.m31;
460  T af = mat.m21 * mat.m42 - mat.m22 * mat.m41;
461  T ac = mat.m22 * mat.m33 - mat.m23 * mat.m32;
462  T a6 = mat.m22 * mat.m43 - mat.m23 * mat.m42;
463 
464  T ab = mat.m23 * mat.m34 - mat.m24 * mat.m33;
465  T a7 = mat.m23 * mat.m44 - mat.m24 * mat.m43;
466  T ae = mat.m21 * mat.m34 - mat.m24 * mat.m31;
467  T ad = mat.m21 * mat.m44 - mat.m24 * mat.m41;
468 
469  T b0 = mat.m22 * mat.m34 - mat.m24 * mat.m32;
470  T b1 = mat.m21 * mat.m43 - mat.m23 * mat.m41;
471  T b2 = mat.m21 * mat.m33 - mat.m23 * mat.m31;
472  T b3 = mat.m22 * mat.m44 - mat.m24 * mat.m42;
473 
474  out = MatrixT(
475  det * t1,
476  -det * (mat.m12 * a3 - mat.m13 * a5 + mat.m14 * a2),
477  det * (mat.m12 * a7 - mat.m13 * b3 + mat.m14 * a6),
478  -det * (mat.m12 * ab - mat.m13 * b0 + mat.m14 * ac),
479 
480  -det * t2,
481  det * (mat.m11 * a3 - mat.m13 * a8 + mat.m14 * aa),
482  -det * (mat.m11 * a7 - mat.m13 * ad + mat.m14 * b1),
483  det * (mat.m11 * ab - mat.m13 * ae + mat.m14 * b2),
484 
485  det * t3,
486  -det * (mat.m11 * a5 - mat.m12 * a8 + mat.m14 * a9),
487  det * (mat.m11 * b3 - mat.m12 * ad + mat.m14 * af),
488  -det * (mat.m11 * b0 - mat.m12 * ae + mat.m14 * a0),
489 
490  -det * t4,
491  det * (mat.m11 * a2 - mat.m12 * aa + mat.m13 * a9),
492  -det * (mat.m11 * a6 - mat.m12 * b1 + mat.m13 * af),
493  det * (mat.m11 * ac - mat.m12 * b2 + mat.m13 * a0));
494  return out;
495  }
496 
497  template <class T>
498  inline MatrixT<T>& MatrixT<T>::transpose(MatrixT& out, const MatrixT& mat)
499  {
500  vector4* rows = (vector4*)mat.ml;
501  out = MatrixT(
502  rows[0].x, rows[1].x, rows[2].x, rows[3].x,
503  rows[0].y, rows[1].y, rows[2].y, rows[3].y,
504  rows[0].z, rows[1].z, rows[2].z, rows[3].z,
505  rows[0].w, rows[1].w, rows[2].w, rows[3].w);
506  return out;
507  }
508 
509  template <class T>
510  inline VectorT3<T>& MatrixT<T>::transformVec3(VectorT3<T>& out, const vector3& in, const MatrixT& mat)
511  {
512  out = vector3(
513  in.x * mat.m11 + in.y * mat.m21 + in.z * mat.m31 + mat.m41,
514  in.x * mat.m12 + in.y * mat.m22 + in.z * mat.m32 + mat.m42,
515  in.x * mat.m13 + in.y * mat.m23 + in.z * mat.m33 + mat.m43);
516  return out;
517  }
518 
519  template <class T>
520  inline VectorT4<T>& MatrixT<T>::transformVec4(VectorT4<T>& out, const vector4& in, const MatrixT& mat)
521  {
522  out = vector4(
523  in.x * mat.m11 + in.y * mat.m21 + in.z * mat.m31 + in.w * mat.m41,
524  in.x * mat.m12 + in.y * mat.m22 + in.z * mat.m32 + in.w * mat.m42,
525  in.x * mat.m13 + in.y * mat.m23 + in.z * mat.m33 + in.w * mat.m43,
526  in.x * mat.m14 + in.y * mat.m24 + in.z * mat.m34 + in.w * mat.m44);
527  return out;
528  }
